Name: EmbeddedSignerWithFormInsurance
Publication Readiness: NOT READY 1. Same feedback re: header and description as above 2. After the form, signing session opens outside of Sample Apps iframe, this is wrong. 3. The "You've signed document" page is also outside of Sample App, so user is lost - no link to registration, no link to github, no Finish demo button.
Landing description: Walk through the medical insurance claim form signing powered by the airSlate SignNow API. Complete the web form to pre-fill the insurance claim form, fill out the required fields, and download the signed claim form.
steps: Step 1: Open Form with fields: Name - text, required Email - email, not required User fills in form fields to proceed to Step 2. Step 2. Open Embedded Signer. Name and Email fields are pre-filled from the Form. User completes the document to proceed to Step 3. Step 3: User can download completed document. User clicks Finish button to go to the Finish page. Step 4: Open Finish page.
